channel.title: Breakfast on Lam Family Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on Lam Family Cookbook

item.title: Breakfast oats
item.description: Method In a jar, add: 1 cup oats Assorted dry ingredients: Chia seeds Cacao nibs Goji berries Sultanas Dried apricot Then add: ~1 cup (cover dry ingredients) milk ~1 cup (3 large scoops) yoghurt Mix thoroughly, add fresh soft fruit on top: Grapes Berries Mango Peach Nectarine
